name: oak-terraform-actions
description: The `actions` folder is designed to house reusable GitHub Actions for **Terraform**, making it easy to manage and share automation across different repositories. See the Example folder to get started.

scripts.lint: npm run lint:check-yamllint && npm run lint:yaml
scripts.lint:check-yamllint: command -v yamllint >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ PASS: yamllint is installed.' || echo 'ðŸ˜­ ERROR: yamllint is not installed. Please install it using \"pip install yamllint\".'
